pkgmetadata.longdescription: Significance of Boundaries // Separates significant boundary constraints in a dataset from illusions. A modified permutation test is applied using the no-data zone areas above the top- left, top-right, bottom-right and bottom-left boundary lines as test statistics. The observed no-data zone areas are compared to the distribution of the random permutations to calculate a p-value for each boundary line. An article detailing the methodologies and rationale is currently in preparation.
